Reviews.Title: great phone :D
Reviews.Author: Luis Andujar
Reviews.Content: all i must say is that this phone is very good specially if you are looking for something that its just to basically make calls and use it with your radio using Bluetooth while driving and since its unlocked you can take it overseas put another sim card and use it on the spot.

Reviews.Title: Good cellular
Reviews.Author: Rene
Reviews.Content: The cell phone is good and is simple, it has not a good resolution and screen images, only bad thing was the seller Cellular Ross, I bought a new phone and sent me a used one, I could not return because I was traveling outside USA. I do not recommend the seller.

Reviews.Title: Seems to be used..
Reviews.Author: Pen
Reviews.Content: I expected a new phone but this phone seems to be used. It already had a few US phone numbers in the phone book. Also the product box seems to be newly taped, the old tape has been removed. Very basic phone, I just wanted my phone to work. International phones sold on online sites sucks.

Reviews.Title: Not sending it back - problem solved
Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: "HassleFree cell"?  No (vis-a-vis the product) and yes (vis-a-vis the seller).1.  I learned the hard way that when you buy the "international" version, the phone you get will be that sold in a different country from the US. This was an unlocked Vodaphone unit with instructions in Spanish. I had to hunt on the Samsung website, since the model number doesn't even appear on the US website. When I finally went to its regional site for Spain, I found the model number and got instructions in English.Hassle #1.2.  The international version of this phone comes with a charger with a European-style plug and an adapter for US outlets. I inserted my SIM and battery and plugged the phone in to charge it. Nothing happened. Zero. The plug adapter, in fact, nearly fell out of the wall outlet, it was so loose. Nor does the charger plug fit tightly into the adapter. The manufacturer could not have made them fit each other and the outlet more poorly if he had deliberately attempted to get it wrong.Hassle #2.I tried a different plug adapter and, after wiggling the charger plus around a bit, got the phone to light up. For a moment. But as soon as I let go of the plug, the connection was lost. Wiggle it one way -- on. Wiggle it another, or let it go -- off. On. Off. Mostly off.It is just a terrible, very loose fit. Bottom line: the charger and adapter that come with this phone are both garbage.In the few times that the screen did light up for a couple of seconds, I saw the word "cargando" or "charging," in Spanish. This told me that all the menus were going to be in Spanish. Again: not what I expected.Hassle #3.UPDATE: I contacted the seller, HassleFreeCell, who was very apologetic and very responsive. At that point he sent me the link to the English language instructions, assured me that the language of the menus could be changed, and offered to step me through the process over the phone, once we got the phone charged.He sent me a new adapter, but that didn't work, since the problem was also with the charger. So HFC ordered me a new charger -- the US version -- from Amazon at no cost to me. Very classy. I was finally able to charge my new phone and make sure the SIM from my former T-Mobile phone worked. It does -- just fine.The instructions are poor. But this phone is probably as simple as it gets, so even though I had to muddle through a bit (I'm not a big cellphone user), it was fairly intuitive.Even though it's unlocked, it's a Vodaphone, so you see that logo every time you turn it on. No big deal. When that goes away, "Welcome to T-Mobile" comes on.Even though the phone said "cargando" in Spanish, all the menus, etc. have come up in English. Maybe the phone read the SIM, and changed itself? Don't know, don't care. (If it hadn't done that, I see how to change the phone's language and it's easy.)I do have to re-enter my address book from my previous phone. But this phone gives you the option of adding names to the phone or to the SIM (or both, I guess), so in future my contact names should transfer to my new phone.All the bells and whistles (camera, radio, etc.) are of no interest to me. I really just want the phone, and in that respect it's very straightforward. I can't really comment on battery life just yet, since I just started using it yesterday.Does this quad band phone work in Costa Rica? In theory, it should. In practice, maybe not so well. The best coverage in CR is 3G, not GSM. I did know that beforehand, but decided it didn't make sense for me to buy a 3G phone I didn't really need, just so it would work while I was on vacation. I'll rent a 3G phone while I'm in CR, and look forward to using this phone in Europe.

Reviews.Title: menu in Spanish; advertised as English; hard to return
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Tebbets
Reviews.Content: "Cell phone kings", fulfilled by Amazon. Samsung SA-3050 cell phone. Menu was in Spanish. I ordered in English, product info was in English, no indication of Spanish language anywhere. Amazon says I can return, but that means an hour or two packaging and driving to post office, and means that I have to pay postage when they made the error. Not satisfactory at all.

Reviews.Title: Neat Little Phone Perfect For T-Mobile Users
Reviews.Author: StarDriver "StarDriver"
Reviews.Content: Picked this up as a transition replacement between my stately but ancient Motorola V-195 and a future Windows phone after the prices drop. The Stratus is sleek and compact, with a great slider feel and a cool Euro design. It takes about a day to figure out and implement all the features but once you tame this beast, it does everything you want--and more--for a basic call and text phone.Originally made for the International Vodaphone market, it ships with an two-prong plug and a USA adapter. Headset included along with a fairly shoddy user's manual. Turning on the phone activates the most annoying disco-techno button tones you've ever heard, but this annoyance is easily resolved simply by turning down the volume control until the tones are turned off. Although the initial phone setting were in Spanish, once I installed my T-Mobile Sim card, the setup wizard changed all the settings to English and it was smooth sailing after that. The feature list for the Stratus is extensive: MP3 player, FM radio, low-level camera with a lot of settings for different lighting situations, e-mail, browsers, apps, etc. But the neatest aspects are the design and the in-hand slider feel. T-Mobile's signal is strong in my zip code, so there are no issues with signal strength and dropped calls.  The Stratus just looks and feels great, with outstanding call quality for both the speaker and the headset. I couldn't ask for anything more in a basic, inexpensive mobile phone.

Reviews.Title: Poor Battery. Features are OK
Reviews.Author: Nanda
Reviews.Content: I got this phone on February and the battery life is very bad. Initialy it was good but after 2 months it turned horrific. After full night charge, the charge does not lasts more than 3pm, if I talk more than 30 minutes.  Other features works fine. I would recommend rather buy a pre-paid phone service from ur cell service provider which comes with the phone and use just the phone alone.

Reviews.Title: Just right for simple use
Reviews.Author: bainibear Z
Reviews.Content: I received it in 2 days with Amazon prime and it came in very good condition. There was no manual provided but you can always find a user guide online so it wasn't an issue.  The charger's not of US standards but an adaptor was provided so that was a plus. For a supposedly simple use phone, the menu option's a little tricky compared to our other samsung units. Even the graphic's not as sharp. Headset's included and my husband likes the FM radio, but the ringtones are limited.. not that it matters to him.  The camera's acceptable and the keys are enough for bigger fingers.  It's just right for simple talk & text use. Just what we are after and it delivered. Happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice, cheap and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Lebasi
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone, very simple to use and not expensive.It is perfect to use internationally where you buy a prepaid SIM card in different countries for a better control on the cost.

Reviews.Title: Serve the purpose
Reviews.Author: Dove
Reviews.Content: Cute little phone but smaller than expected. The phone also came configured in a language other than English and this was not declared on the site. The unit was purchased for another country and the SIM card work as expected.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: C. Jackson
Reviews.Content: The phone did arrive on time and in excellent condition. I'm very glad I bought this phone, great product. Just wanted a phone to make calls, send a text and listen to music and its perfect for that.

Reviews.Title: A good cell phone, a good price
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I was satisfied with this purchase because the cell phone was ready to use. I just put the chip inside of it, and I was already  talking.

Reviews.Title: ok for now
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: No complaints.Alitte small... But works.Good value . Still to soon to totally evaluate.Liked to have at least 3 months before giving a complete opinion .

Reviews.Title: I loved it
Reviews.Author: Nikita
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a present for my Uncle and He LOVED it but I rated 4 star because it wasn't sealed/the box was not. But phone still great, works new, NO scratches, and everything included people Highly recommend it :)

Reviews.Title: Neat little phone
Reviews.Author: Dodger
Reviews.Content: Great little phone for the money. Controls are good, slide out keyboard clear and easy to use. The mini SD card (an extra) is a great way to transfer photos to PC. Only minor criticisms are dated graphic display and skimpy user manual.

Reviews.Title: excellent phone
Reviews.Author: JCDel "Johnandel"
Reviews.Content: I bought this while in the USA due to losing my charger for my UK Samsung.Thinking this will charge my existing phone as well. For the price, I was highly delighted when it arrived.Good little camera,excellent responsive texting.Brilliant,I now use it all the time.Quad band can't fault it.

Reviews.Title: Menus in Spanish; Will return it.
Reviews.Author: Dharamdas M. Ramnani
Reviews.Content: I got the phone yesterday. It looks sleek but the screen resolution is poor. The most important drawback (at least for me) is that all the menus / prompts are in Spanish and will not work for me. Even the instruction manual is in Spanish. So I'm returning this phone. I would have kept it had it been in English. I was disappointed that nowhere was it mentioned on the website that this phone was built for spanish-speaking customers.

Reviews.Title: instuction book
Reviews.Author: Anthony S. Daloia
Reviews.Content: came with no instruction booklet. very confusing. this is a European phone. I don't know how they put up with them over there. I would NOT RECCOMEND This phoney phone to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Samsung SA-C3050 Unlocked Phone with 15MB built-in memory, MP3 player,...
Reviews.Author: Marguerite Thompson
Reviews.Content: Indeed my father is enjoying this cell phone that I have purchase for him and he have no problems with his phone I will recommend the phone to anyone who is looking to purchase one.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Phone
Reviews.Author: Robert Marsden
Reviews.Content: This phone was terrible , it comes in Japanese no English I  am unable to use itI would not advice anyone to buy it

Reviews.Title: Basic phone, works well
Reviews.Author: buds_2000 "qtnd"
Reviews.Content: Refurbished phone, works well, does not have all the bells & whistle but does the job, recommended to all that do not want smart phone

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: adiara
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished Samsung SA-C3050 Unlocked to send to my relative in africa.  They said it works well and they like.  They think that i sent them a brand new phone.

Reviews.Title: not so great
Reviews.Author: VSATHI
Reviews.Content: display really sucks, i am not happy with the purchase, it is just phone, dont have much theme choices, will not recommend

Reviews.Title: PHONE CAME LOCKED
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed in this product the review said it was unlocked, it wasnt. Online reviews say that the unlock code is one thing or another but it doesnt work. I had to have it unlocked. Aside from this it feels very light and toy  like!I dont recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: loved
Reviews.Author: braulio 9920317
Reviews.Content: This score was chosen for "love" as the color of the product along with its quality make the vendor is qualified in such manner. I recommended to my niece buy a model phone celular and hopefully soon will enter. thanks

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Juan Pinzon
Reviews.Content: It is Good product I got the product in right time. I recommend this product and I will buy it again

Reviews.Title: Locked Phone Supplied -Poor Customer Response
Reviews.Author: god9
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product along with another phone. And noticed later when i put to use out of US, that it is a locked phone and also the initial language displayed is in  european language , you do not get english manual, so get your skills upgraded to figure out how to convert the same to english and then check if it works as unlocked phone.CHeck 10 times to ensure it is unlocked less you might be left to customer care who seems to have a single view point . THese guys send you a locked phone and then ignore to reimburse the cost of unlocking .....So be doubel sure when you recieve the phone, that it is a unlocked phone. Easy to handle and the only good thing is it display the typed numbers in big fonts , and i like the slide .

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Patty
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived in good condition worked well when I insert the sim card but the battery  runs out fast.It came with all the accessories the phone is ok.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: The Pearl
Reviews.Content: Very nice and works good, I likes it a lot  and will strongly recomenden it to anyone,it works very well in my country.

Reviews.Title: Samsung C3053
Reviews.Author: Weng Chan
Reviews.Content: the phone works correctly in concordance with the specifications that describe the seller and the manufacturer's website, the only problem I see is that the seller does not specify that this phone is marked with the logo of Vodafone so I subtract one star to the Ratings in general is a good phone I was given before the time of delivery and functioning properly.

Reviews.Title: Carla T
Reviews.Author: Carla T
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mom. When my dad saw it, he got jealous and so now I have to find a way to fit another one on my budget. They love and so I know I made a great buy.

Reviews.Title: just as advertised
Reviews.Author: oldshep
Reviews.Content: Received product from unlocked celphone kings.appeared to be new. For those other people who reviewedthis phone and complained about a T-Mobile or Vodaphone splashat startup they really need to get a life. After I inserted my sim cardand turned the phone on it correctly ID ed my home network as ATT.What more do you want from a entry level unlocked phone?I've dropped the thing a couple times and it still works like a champ.My usage is voice only with an occasional need for the camera.I opened a Amazon Visa and got an additional 30.00 off the purchase. Great deal,no contract. I'm thinking of switching to Boost Mobile to see if it workson that network. Read the description carefully and use unlocked celphone kingsas the vendor.

Reviews.Title: phone works ok
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got the phone on time and it works fine for the time being. However the charger pin was bend so I was unable to use it. Had to buy another charger that was disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great cell phone! Good price!
Reviews.Author: Susana Delia Suarez "nanana.s"
Reviews.Content: First: sorry for my english!!! Lo escribo en español:estoy muy contenta con la compra xq es un excelente tel. Pude usarlo desde el primer momento,sin ningún incoveniente, explcaciones claras y hasta ahora funciona muy bien. Para estar completo,tendría q haber incluído en cable para computadora. Por lo demás, es MUY BUENO! Recomiendo tanto el tel. como el vendedor. MUCHAS GRACIAS!

Reviews.Title: Horrendous Reception
Reviews.Author: Alex J. Sheppard
Reviews.Content: This phone gets terrible reception for us on AT&T.;  This is compared to multiple other phones and models we have used at the same location.  You should try something else at this price point.

Reviews.Title: sleek & pretty basic phone
Reviews.Author: RR.M
Reviews.Content: Samsung C3050 my first time to order from amazon. Delivery was fast, phone was in good condition. Overall luv the look & feel of the phone but was not intended for my kind of features. It was definitely basic for text & call so I gave it a 3 star.

Reviews.Title: Unacceptable!
Reviews.Author: Bernardo Martins
Reviews.Content: This is what i posted earlier, and this what UnlockedCellPhoneKings answered. Total disrespect."Terrible. The phone came with a T Mobile logo on it... it changes my sound settings randomly, at anytime... good phone, but with defects... "Date: June 26, 2010  Rated by Buyer: Bernardo M.Seller Response: "T-mobile does not carry this model phone. How is it possible that a T-mobile logo is on this phone?"  Date: June 26, 2010They offered to take it back, but I'm in a business trip, for 6 months, and I bought the phone for this trip... And now I'm stuck in South America, with a defective phone, with a T-Mobile logo right on top of the screen...but i'm not a T-Mobile customer, neither is T-Mobile the phone's manufacturer...Even worse than sending me a weird phone, is the fact that the seller doubted or questioned the fact that the T-Mobile logo is on it...Unacceptable!

Reviews.Title: not recommand
Reviews.Author: kazim raza
Reviews.Content: i order this phone is looking good but when u open the box phone is not looks good,2nd i fine the language i cant understand may be German or french and i can not set this phone up to English totally useless for me.the third thing the phone looks cheaper phone if u compare with razor phone or other same category phone.so i will not recommend at all someone to buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: Sleek Stylish and Priced Great
Reviews.Author: Mr Blister "Mr. S"
Reviews.Content: Slider, users will certainly speak with style. With the slim and ergonomic shape fits the phone very nicely in the hand and he slips effortlessly into your purse or pocket. This slider is not only super modern, but also highly functional. On the 2 "wide LCD display lets you see the contents of your phone very clearly.Beautiful photosWith the built-in VGA camera of the C3050 you can pretty unexpected events now always capture. You can have great pictures and make them together into a panoramic image.That is music to the earsThe C3050 gives you the decision on your personal jukebox with your favorite bands, albums and songs. Transfer your favorite songs on a microSD memory card and even set as background while using other applications on your phone. If you want to listen to the latest hits, set your FM radio, 24 hours a day that music, news and information. In short, everywhere and always listen to your favorite music.
